title: encoding/json: Change of behaviour when decoding json null values into RawMessage
body:
https://github.com/golang/go/commit/1a99ba55df902a2657d1ccfc52a60024c22dba98 seems to have changed how json null values are decoded into json.RawMessages. After that commit a null value is decoded into an empty byte array whereas before they were decoded into []byte("null"), as can be seen here:

  https://play.golang.org/p/m4ubMyAcqL
